'''Venti''' is a playable [[Anemo]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

He is a free-spirited, wine-loving bard in [[Mondstadt]] and the current mortal vessel of [[Barbatos]], the Anemo [[Archon]].
